translation: The sattvic, or pure, men worship the gods; the rajasic, or passionate, worship the yakshas and rakshasas; the others, the tamasic or deluded people, worship ghosts and hosts of nature-spirits.
commentary: 17.4 Yajante worship? Sattvikas the Sattvic or pure men? Devan the gods? the Yakshas and the Rakshasas? Rajasah the Rajasic or the passionate? Pretan ghosts? Bhootaganaan the hosts of Bhutas or the naturespirits? f and? Others the others? Yajante worship? Tamasah the Tamasic? People people.Commentary Lord Krishna? after defining faith? tells Arjuna how this faith determines the object of worship.
